page.title: 01GAZETEER
page.content: This area of S.E. Durham is situated on the permian limestone escarpment and in contrast to the industrial nature of the N.E. is a mainly agricultural region. The main settlement is in the north of the area, the south containing scattered farms. CONTRIBUTERS Brian Urwin, Stephen Pain, David Emmerson, Stephen Collin, Jeffrey Taylor, Michael Egan, Brian Carter, Neil Armstrong, David Farry, Gordon Preston, Nigel Easby, Carl Winwood, Suzanne Lovegreen, Susan Barnfather, Natalie Valente, Louise Jenkins.
